Question: Shenzhen Topway New Energy Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Topway New Energy Co., Ltd

Renewable Energy Power Generation

- Specializes in lithium batteries for digital products, telecommunications, electric tools, solar storage, and electric vehicles
- Offers lithium polymer, lithium ion, and lithium iron phosphate batteries
- Provides OEM&ODM services and has more than 20 product technology patents
- Focuses on LiFePO4 and lithium cells and battery packs for Green Energy Storage Systems
- Offers products such as Lithium-ion Battery, Lithium Polymer Battery, OEM&ODM 12V/24V/36V/48V LiFePO4 Battery Packs, Powerwall, ALL one Powerwall, Inverters, Photovoltaic solar panels, Transformers, and solar street light controllers
